title: PositionType
description: A type that defines a position type and related identifiers.

remunerationBasisCode.description: A code classifying the primary method by which remuneration for a position is provided or calculated. Examples include Hourly, Salaried, Salaried plus Commission, Commission Only, Salaried plus Bonus, etc.

positionTypeCode.description: The code of the position type.

careerLevelCode.description: The code representing the career level.
